inn1.comm: Gul runs in from the shadows and pitches the ball on a length on the sunlit pitch, the line is outside leg though so Tharanga glances off his hips to long leg
wide outside off stump, Dilshan shoulders arms. Did I mention Gul has two slips?
Gul hits the pitch on a good length but the line is too wide outside off, the ball seams away as well, so the umpire calls it wide
closer to off stump this time, Dilshan lets it go again
that's a wide wide outside off stump, Gul needs to readjust his radar by several degrees
good length outside off stump, Dilshan strides forward and shoulders arms
good length outside off stump with seam movement, Dilshan lets it go again

good delivery to end the over, lands on a length around off and then springs off the pitch and cuts away from the right-hander, Dilshan came forward and then pulled his bat inside the line of the ball
Cheema's radar is wonky as well, the first ball is far down leg side, giving Sarfraz a work out
too straight on the pads and Tharanga clips to fine leg
better length and line to the right-hander outside off stump, Dilshan lets it go again. He's being watchful today, not even thought about slashing at the width
full ball outside off stump, Dilshan stays in his crease and plays the square drive through cover point
launched over cover! Tharanga has width outside off to free his arms and he drives flamboyantly, lofting the full ball over the in field
Cheema replies with a skiddy delivery that pitches on a good length and seams away from the left-hander, Tharanga doesn't move his feet as he fishes outside off and catches nothing
length ball outside off, driven from the crease towards cover point
Gul continues pounding the pitch far too wide outside off stump
that is a potent delivery, pitched on a good length, angled into the right-hander, and then cut away off the pitch, beating the outside edge of Dilshan's defensive push
a splendid ball beats the bat, it was fuller and quicker, over 140, it pitched around off and swung away from Dilshan, who was caught on the crease and prodded helplessly
left alone outside off stump, this was easier to let go, a slightly wider line
once again Dilshan gets beaten by the ball that angles into him around off and then cuts away off the pitch
Dilshan can't hit a thing at the moment, which is why he's still out there! Gul speeds past the outside edge with one that pitches just outside off and holds its line
this time Gul is a bit too straight, and Dilshan can turn the ball off his pads behind square
short and wide outside off stump, Dilshan cuts it hard but can't beat point
full ball driven firmly to the bowler, Cheema gets a hand on it and deflects it past mid-on
edged through the slip cordon for four! Tharanga fended outside off stump from his crease and the edge did not carry to the catchers, it bounced just in front of them and went through the gap
played from the crease towards point
good length around off, Tharanga plays from his crease and angles his bat to guide the ball through point
Dilshan plays the ball with soft hands towards midwicket and sprints the single
Dilshan moves forward and tries to cover drive but the ball is too good, it pitches on a great length and moves away, beating the bat
this time Gul pitches a bit too wide outside off stump, the extras are mounting
Dilshan stays in his crease and angles his bat to play the ball to point
Dilshan pushes forward to defend but the ball takes the outside edge and goes wide of second slip and beats third man
another excellent ball, bounces high from a good length and seams away from the right-hander, Dilshan lets it go
left alone once again outside off stump
and again he gets beaten, Dilshan tries to defend from his crease and the ball seams away from him
length ball on middle stump, played from the crease to square leg
pushed from the crease towards cover
Cheema slants the ball across Tharanga after pitching in line with the stump and beats the bat
that's a full ball on the pads and Tharanga makes good use of the loose ball, whipping it through midwicket for a boundary
played back to the bowler from the crease

dropped! The ball was full and wide outside off stump, there to be driven. Tharanga went for it, freeing his arms and going hard at the ball. He hit it flat and in the air straight to Farhat at cover and he dropped it
defended from the crease on the off side
defended back to Gul once again, Dilshan is being remarkably circumspect
this time he goes after one that seams away from him outside off stump, his heart wasn't in the shot though, he played it half-heartedly, and was beaten
and another one goes past the outside edge, Gul hits a perfect length and moves the ball away from Dilshan, who came forward to defend

superb bowling! Gul doesn't seam the ball away this time, he gets it to go straight through after pitching on off stump. Dilshan thought it would move away and was beginning to let it go. He then saw the ball coming straight at him and tried to pad it away. The ball went past the pad and over the top of off stump
Dilshan tries to work the ball off his hips but doesn't make proper contact
full ball on the pads, played through square
played off the pads to short midwicket
Tharanga stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
the ball is too far outside leg stump for Tharanga to connect with the glance
Tharanga stays on the back foot and pushes at a ball that angles across him, the ball goes off the slice towards third man
that's too short and Dilshan releases the pressure by pulling from his crease to the midwicket boundary
another short ball and Dilshan smashes it, pulling through square leg this time with more power
pushed on the off side for a single
Gul bowls a fullish ball on off and middle, Dilshan plays it to mid-off where Afridi slides and fields
Dilshan waits for the ball to angle into him before playing of his hips to square leg
good length angling into the right-hander, Dilshan plays towards midwicket and sprints to get off strike

driven, in the air but through the gap between short cover and mid-off for four, the fielder at short cover, Misbah, dived to his left but the ball was too far away. Tharanga hit that off the front foot, driving away from his body
defended on the leg side
bowled from very wide of the crease from round the wicket, played towards leg slip
bowled into the pads from round the wicket, Dilshan plays to midwicket and runs
Ajmal angles the ball into the left-hander and hits the pad, that was missing leg
that was the doosra, spinning into the left-hander, Tharanga defends on the leg side
defended on the off side
Tharanga stays on the back foot and defends on the off side
he's flayed that through backward point! Dilshan winds up as the ball pitches short and wide outside off, and then slashes it hard through the gap
cut again, this time in front of point to the fielder in the deep
Tharanga stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
an uber-slow ball from Razzaq, Tharanga had already finished his shot before the ball hit the back of the bat and lobbed safely on the leg side
played off the from off towards the off side
wicket to wicket line from Razzaq, defended back to the bowler
Dilshan tries to cut one that is far too close to off stump and mis-times it to point

bowled him! There's the signature Afridi celebration, legs splayed, arms aloft, fingers pointing to the sky. Dilshan once again tried to cut the ball when there was no room. It pitched on off and slid straight through, beating the bat and crashing into the stumps.
defended on the leg side, Afridi strides across to collect
width outside off stump and Sangakkara gets going by cutting to deep point
that was an offbreak from Afridi, pitched outside off stump and spun away from the left-hander, Tharanga let it go
defended on the leg side
length delivery on middle and off, played back to the bowler
Sangakkara moves forward and defends a good length ball towards cover
played off the pads between midwicket and mid-on
there's some with outside off and Tharanga uses it to cut through point
Sangakkara strides forward, waits for the length ball outside off, and drives to cover
Razzaq's got away with that, it was on the pads but Tharanga couldn't connect with the bat. The keeper collects after the ball clips the pad
Sangakkara moves forward to turn the ball through square but doesn't hit it, it goes off his pad behind square
Tharanga tries to work a ball that angles into him from round the wicket through square but gets hit on the pad
defended from the crease on the off side
pushed off the front foot towards long on
driven off the front foot along the ground to long-off
Tharanga tries to drive but mis-times the shot towards the bowler
another mis-timed drive, to mid-off
played off the front foot to point
length ball outside off stump, Sangakkara glides on to the front foot and drives to mid-off
Razzaq pitches on leg stump and Sangakkara taps the ball off his pads in front of square leg
Tharanga cuts the length ball from outside off to deep point

such a soft dismissal! Sangakkara pushed forward too early to a very slow ball and tried to play down the ground. He ended up popping the easiest of return catches towards Razzaq's left, comfortably taken
Tharanga tries to cut one that's wide outside off and bottom edges it into the ground
driven to long-off for a single
Chandimal pushes his first ball to cover
this is nearly in the blockhole and Chandimal plays it towards long on
Tharanga pushes forward at one that slides across him and gets a thick outside edge that goes towards third man, Akmal chases and saves the boundary
Chandimal lets a good length ball pass outside off stump
Razzaq angles the length ball into Tharanga from round the wicket, the batsman plays in front of point
full ball down leg side, too far away for Chandimal to glance
good length around of, played from the crease to mid-off
good length on off and middle, Chandimal moves forward and a little across and plays to mid-on
slightly shorter length, played off the back foot towards the leg side
full delivery and a straight line, Chandimal drives back to Razzaq
a slower ball outside off at 89 kph, Chandimal waits in his crease and cuts to deep point
defended on the leg side
Chandimal pushes forward and opens the face to play towards short third man
quick and straight from Afridi, Tharanga plays from the crease to cover
played off the pads to midwicket
the quicker one that slides straight through, the line is outside off and Tharanga cuts through point
played off the pads towards deep backward square leg
defended from the crease on the off side, Chandimal got behind the line of the ball nicely
good length and straight, defended from the crease on the leg side
a little quicker from Razzaq, Chandimal gets behind the line on the back foot and blocks

a super-slow ball outside off stump, Chandimal bottom edges the cut into the ground and runs. There's a collision between the keeper Sarfraz and the fielder at point, Umar Akmal. Both sprinted to the ball
played back to the bowler
Tharanga mis-times the ball past the bowler and runs the single before mid-off can prevent it
bowled flat and straight from round the wicket, defended back to the bowler
more flat and straight stuff, played off the back foot to the bowler
dropped! Hafeez slowed his pace and turned the offbreak away from Tharanga after drifting into him. Tharanga tried to cut and got an edge to Sarfraz, the ball popped in and out of his gloves.
cut off the back foot to deep point
defended back to the bowler
Chandimal charges and hits the ball in the air over extra cover, he didn't time it well but the ball fell safely
good length just outside off stump, defended on the off side
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
defended from the crease towards the bowler once again
Chandimal makes room by moving towards leg and slogs, trying to hit with a flat bat down the ground. The length is a bit short and he makes no contact
this time Chandimal tries to run the ball to third man, but gets beaten again
good length around off stump, defended on the front foot
punched off the back foot towards mid-off, Hafeez moves to his right and fields
played off the back foot towards point
Tharanga pushes forward to play to mid-on, but Hafeez scampers to his left and fields
defended back to the bowler
drifts on to the pad this time and Tharanga plays to backward square leg, there's a direct hit at the striker's end and an overthrow results
defended back to the bowler
dabbed off the back foot towards point for a quick single, Akmal swoops and hits the batsman at the non-striker's end with his flat throw
punched from his crease towards mid-off

Tharanga pushes the ball back to the bowler and runs after Razzaq fails to stop it cleanly, the ball trickles past the stumps and Tharanga charges through for the single, making his crease before the direct hit
defended on the back foot on the of side
Chandimal clears his front foot out of the way and swings for the terraces, the length isn't full enough and the line is outside off, not ideal for such a shot
played from the crease on the leg side
played off the back foot towards extra cover
defended back to the bowler
Tharanga moves forward to push but plays the wrong line and gets hit on the pad
a quicker one slides into Tharanga from round the wicket and hits the back pad, that was missing leg stump though
defended back to the bowler again
played off the back foot to midwicket, maiden over
leg-stump line, Chandimal plays to square leg
quicker ball but the line is poor, on the pads, Chandimal gets some bat on it and sends the ball racing to the fine-leg boundary
again Ajmal drifts on to the pads, Chandimal plays to square leg
it's the straighter one this time, outside off, Chandimal pushes at it and is beaten
played off the pads on the leg side
another leg stump delivery, played from the crease to square leg
Tharanga tries to drive through the off side but gets an inside edge on to the pad
this time he connects with the drive to long-off
tight line around off stump, defended on the front foot
worked off the pads through square leg
played toward point off the front foot
played back to the bowler on the front foot
Ajmal bowls a doosra which Chandimal manages to play behind point
driven from the crease through point

bowled him! Chandimal, after a slow innings, tried to break free by clearing his front foot towards leg side and trying to mow over midwicket. The straighter ball from Ajmal beat the bat and hit off stump
Jayawardene strides forward and opens the face to play the ball along the ground to Younis Khan at first slip, he can't stop it cleanly
quicker ball on middle stump, played off the back foot on the leg side
pushed towards cover on the front foot
defended from the crease to the bowler
played off the pads to square leg
the quicker one that comes into the right-hander, defended from the crease

huge appeal from Afridi for lbw but it is turned down by the umpire. Pakistan decide not to review. Mahela was hit on the front foot after taking a stride down the pitch. Enough doubt there, height was a problem
defended on the leg side
Mahela gets behind the line of a full ball and defends on the off side
defended on the front foot on the leg side
nudged off the pads to square leg for a quick single
Mahela strides forward to defend but gets beaten by the doosra that slants across him from round the wicket
played off the front foot to square leg
Tharanga stays in his crease and plays the ball to deep square leg
Mahela tries to cut the ball to third man as it angles across him, he gets beaten outside off stump once again
defended from the crease on the off side
Afridi bowls the googly and Tharanga gets beaten outside off stump
a slower ball outside off stump, Tharanga tries to drive expansively but gets beaten by some extra bounce
played to short fine leg
full and straight, driven to long-off from the crease
Mahela moves forward and plays the straight ball to midwicket
bowled full on middle stump, driven to long off for a single that takes Sri Lanka to 100
Mahela moves outside off, gets down low, and paddles the ball to fine leg
defended back to the bowler
Tharanga leans into a front-foot extra cover drive, the fielder at long-off has to run to his right
Tharanga pushes from his crease at one that turns slightly away from him and is beaten, Sarfraz doesn't collect cleanly
this time he gets a bit of a leading edge towards point
driven off the front foot to long-off
Tharanga moves back and cuts to deep point. "Only one," yells Sarfraz
pushed off the front foot to long on
Afridi slows up the pace and bowls one that goes on with the arm, Tharanga pushes forward and is beaten outside off
driven firmly off the front foot to wide long-off
played off the front foot to long-on
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Tharanga gets to a hard-fought fifty by lofting inside-out over extra cover. The fielder on the cover boundary runs to his left and dives but can't prevent the four
played off the pads behind square
quicker ball on the pads, Jayawardene plays through square leg
played to midwicket off the front foot with a closed face
played to short third man
cut off the back foot to backward point
Jayawardene moves forward and across to glance but the ball is down leg side, it grazes the pad and goes past the keeper
played to long off for a single
beaten outside the off side by a quicker googly
another googly, Tharanga pushes forward and gets beaten once again
shorter length and Tharanga goes back to cut toward deep point
Tharanga cuts off the back foot towards cover even though the ball cramps him for room
played towards long off for a single
Mahela gets down low and reverse-paddles the ball to short third man
punched from the crease to the fielder at cover
punched off the back foot from middle stump to cover
width outside off stump and Tharanga cuts towards backward point, where Afridi intercepts
that's rather wide down leg side
that's not as wide down leg side, but still wide enough to be called
Mahela works the ball off his pads through square
Dabbed on the off side for a quick single towards point
Mahela moves back, opens the face, dabs the ball to backward point and runs a quick single
Ajmal beats Tharanga outside off stump with an offbreak from round the wicket
Tharanga tries to cut off the back foot but is beaten by one that bounces a bit more
Jayawardene cuts from outside off but can't beat backward point
shot! Jayawardene moves to the leg side to make room and lofts the ball inside out over extra cover
nudged off the pads behind square
Jayawardene calls Tharanga through for the leg bye to short fine leg, he had to hurry
he steps out of his crease, gets to the pitch of the ball around off stump, and lofts over the fielder at mid-on, cleanly hit. Mid-on was brought up after that shot over extra cover
defended on the front foot
shorter length with width outside off, Tharanga cuts off the back foot and places the ball through all the gaps
Tharanga walks forward and drives the ball off his pads with power wide of the fielder at mid-on, Younis Khan chases and then dives spectacularly on his belly but can't reach the ball
defended on the off side
driven through cover point to the fielder in the deep
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
just over the head of the fielder at point! Mahela got into position for the reverse pull but didn't get as much elevation as he would have liked. Afridi jumped in the air but couldn't reach the ball
good length outside off stump, Mahela plays with an open face to backward point
good length just outside off, Mahela stays in his crease an defends
Mahela jumps out of his crease and drives the ball hard towards mid-off's left, Afridi dives full length and makes the save
the bouncer, but it's a bit high and slightly down leg side
shorter length and Tharanga pulls to deep midwicket, he hit that from outside off
Tharanga make a bit of room and hits the ball from middle stump in front of square
full ball on the pads, flicked to midwicket for a single. Gul over-stepped as well, so there's a free hit coming up
short of a length with width, Mahela makes room and hits the ball in the air through the gap at cover, he's placed it wide of the fielder in the deep too
worked off the back foot to deep square leg
deft shot. Mahela moves across, gets down on one knee, and scoops the ball to short fine leg
cut off the back foot from off stump to point
superb timing and placement. Tharanga moves back and punches the ball through the gap between point and cover point, the ball simply races away
that's wide down leg side
hits across the line between mid-on and midwicket
played off the pads behind square
a misfield from Hafeez allows the single. Jayawardene opened the face off the back foot and steered to backward point
length ball outside off, Tharanga punches fluently to mid-off where Akmal dives to his right and saves the boundary
the bouncer, Mahela lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
shot! A bit of width outside off and the length was there for the cut, Mahela cracked it hard and past the fielder at point
the slower ball but the line is a bit straight, played of the pads to fine leg
Tharanga tries to cut but the line is too close to off stump and he bottom edges it into the ground
flicked off the pads to deep square leg
caught at wide long-on! Afridi's struck. Tharanga tried to launch the ball over the midwicket boundary but mis-timed it, Younis Khan settled under a simple catch
full ball on middle and leg, Mahela glances off his pads to short fine leg
driven to long on for a single
flicked off the pads through square leg
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Mahela opens the face and drives from the crease but can't get past backward point
shot! Cracking cut shot. Mahela pounces on the width outside off and brings his bat down with such speed, uses his wrists to place the ball past the fielder at backward point
Mahela misses the glance but the ball brushes the pad and Sarfraz can't prevent the leg bye
Mathews stays on the back foot and opens the face late to guide the short of a length ball to third man

huge appeal for caught behind and Pakistan review umpire Richard Illingworth's not-out decision. It was a short of a length delivery outside off stump, which Mathews tried to steer to third man. There was a definite noise as the ball passed the bat, although there was no obvious deviation. The noise is good enough for the umpires, though. The decision has been overturned and Mathews is on his way
played off the pads in front of square leg
width outside off stump, and Mendis cuts to deep point
Mahela moves forward and defends a slower ball
Mahela closes the face a bit early and gets a leading edge on the off side
driven off the front foot to cover
Mahela waits in his crease and opens the face late to guide the googly to short third man
cut hard off the back foot to deep point
short of a length ball down leg side, Pakistan have been awful with wides today
good length and straight, defended back to the bowler, Mendis had no room to work with
Cheema appeals for lbw after Mendis moved a long way across his stumps to play on the leg side, that pitched outside leg stump, the batsman run a leg bye towards square leg
slower ball outside off stump, Mahela opens the face and plays to point
Mendis bottom edges the cut into the ground and they run a single before Sarfraz can run to his left and field
short and wide outside off stump, Mahela moves towards leg and then cuts to third man
that bouncer is far too high, the extras mount
Mendis tries to reverse sweep but misses and is hit on the pad outside off stump, some bat on it perhaps
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
another wide down leg side, Mahela tries to paddle but couldn't connect
dabbed off the front foot in front of point for a single
Mendis moves across and plays a short-arm paddle to short fine leg
Mendis plays a reverse-swat from outside leg stump to point
Mahela moves towards leg stump and cuts the ball past backward point to the fielder in the deep
Maehla backs away and cuts a length ball hard through point, there's protection in the deep though
the slower ball bowled full outside off, Mendis tried to drive through cover but was beaten by the change of pace
Mendis steps out of his crease and hits the ball to the fielder cover, who is on the edge of the circle
full ball on the pads, a touch slower as well, Mahela turns the ball to short fine leg
driven from the crease towards long on
Mahela brings up 50 by driving a low full toss to long off. He's revived this Sri Lankan innings, he's not found scoring easy but he fought hard today

bowled him! Mahela moved a long way towards the leg side to cut Ajmal through the off side. He ended up being too far away from the ball and had to reach for it. Ajmal's line was straight and he hit middle and off stumps after Mahela did not connect. The 10,000 landmark will have to wait.
Perera cuts hard off the back foot to backward point
flat and straight, played back to the bowler
full ball on off and middle, Perera forces it to wide long-on
Perera slogs in the direction of midwicket but gets beaten by the offbreak that pitches outside off and spins away from the left-hander
this time he tries a late cut to third man but is beaten once again outside off
played to cover from the crease
full ball in the blockhole outside off stump, the batsman makes room and tries to reach for it but is beaten
full ball outside off, driven hard towards long off
low full toss outside off stump, played with an open face through point
full toss, it's a slower one, driven past the stumps at the bowler's end
in the blockhole outside off stump, dug out on the off side
Perera rocks back and heaves the ball in the air towards deep midwicket. It falls wide of the fielder, but won't reach the boundary
this time he mis-hits the slog to midwicket on to the pad and runs a single as the ball ends up near the pitch
Mendis makes room and flat-bats a flighted delivery past the bowler, it's hit hard enough to beat long on
Mendis began to try and reverse sweep but that ball was fired far down leg side
huge hit over long off! Perera gets under the ball and swings hard, making clean contact and sending the ball over the boundary comfortably

stumped! Perera comes out of his crease to try and clear the leg side boundary, he gets beaten by a quicker ball that is fired into him, Sarfraz breaks the stumps with the batsman well out of his ground
Malinga tries to slog over the leg side but gets a top edge that lobs towards short third man, Akmal dives to field and gets a hand on it, ensuring it won't go to the boundary

inn2.comm: a half-volley on the pads to start with and Hafeez helps himself, flicking through midwicket to kick start Pakistan's chase
good length but the line is a bit wide outside off stump, left alone by the batsman

caught behind! Hafeez has nicked one that pitched on a good length around off and seamed away from the right-hander, he prodded at it from his crease without using his feet and got a thick edge, which Sangakkara caught with ease
Younis stays on the back foot and opens the face to steer the ball to point, that moved away from the right-hander as well

stunning catch from Sangakkara! He leaped full length to his right to grab the ball with one hand from right in front of first slip. Younis had also poked at the away-seaming delivery without moving his feet and got an edge thicker than Hafeez's. Pakistan in early strife. Younis could have and should have let that go.
Misbah lets a good length ball that shapes away from him go through to the wicketkeeper
on the pads and Farhat clips it to long leg
Farhat gets hit on the pads after missing the shot to square leg, that pitched outside leg
punched off the back foot to point
good length with some movement into the left-hander after angling across, Farhat gets behind the line and blocks
a full ball on the pads, Farhat flicks but can't beat short midwicket
defended on the leg side from the crease
Misbah moves forward and opens the face to steer the ball to point
Misbah shows sound judgement in leaving the ball close to off stump
Misbah reaches out for one that shapes away from him outside off stump and gets a thick edge to third man
that's sprayed wide outside off stump
good length around off stump, a touch slower that was and Farhat was a little early in pushing the ball to cover

in the air but safe! Farhat tried to turn a short of a length ball that rose sharply on him on the leg side, he got a leading edge that looped in the air but hit the ground before Sangakkara could run forward and catch it
cut off the back foot to a wide third man
Farhat fishes outside off stump but gets beaten by one that seams across him from a good length

lbw! Farhat's been given but he's reviewed the decision. Did that pitch in line with the stumps? It did. The ball landed on middle from over the wicket and bent back into the left-hander, beating the bat as it came across the front pad to hit the knee roll. That is plumb. He was hit on the crease
short of a length at the batsman's body, Akmal tucks the ball through square
Akmal tries to blaze the outswinger through cover, reaching for the ball far away from his body, and was beaten
played wide of mid-on for a single
played from the crease towards backward point
Akmal whips a full ball off his pads in the air and to the square leg boundary, poor ball, cleanly dismissed
that's a bad ball and a worse shot. Malinga sprayed it wide outside off stump and Akmal threw his bat at the ball, reaching for it several yards outside off stump. He was beaten
this is a better shot, a full ball outside off and Akmal drove through the line to hit the ball wide of the fielder at mid-off
that bouncer sails over Akmal's head, he's not a tall man
a slower yorker around off stump, Akmal defends
good length and straight, Akmal plays towards mid-on after moving across his crease
defended on the front foot towards mid-on
Misbah strides forward and pushes a good length ball towards point
good length on a tight line close to off stump, defended on the off side
edged but short of the fielder at gully. Misbah pushed at a short of a length ball off the back foot and got a thick edge
too straight and Misbah glances the ball off his pads to fine leg
Akmal jumps back and pokes at a good length ball that seams away from him, he gets beaten
dangerous shot, trying to cut a delivery that isn't short enough, the ball bounces a bit more and moves away to beat the bat
Misbah shoulders arms to a delivery that pitches around off and moves slightly away from the right-hander
good length and straight, Misbah gets behind the line and blocks
a bit too straight from Malinga and Misbah works the ball off his pads through midwicket
Misbah defends solidly on the off side
Misbah watches a good length ball pass outside off stump
he's going to have to bowl that again, far too wide outside off stump
another wide ball outside off, not as wide as the previous one, but wide enough
a hat-trick of wides outside off stump, what is with all the wides today?
that's wide outside off as well, but not wide enough to be called
length ball outside off, punched off the front foot to cover
nudged off the pads towards midwicket
Akmal jumps on to the back foot, gets on top of the bounce of short of a length ball, and steers to third man
good length outside off stump, defended on the off side
short of a length and straight, played off the hips towards square leg
good length outside off, defended on the off side
Misbah tries to glance a short of a length ball off his hips and gets hit on the thigh
full length angling into off and middle stump, played towards midwicket
short and wide outside off stump, Akmal waits in his crease and cuts to third man
Misbah tries to punch the ball through cover point but mis-times it
Misbah defends on the front foot but gets a bit of an inside edge
good length around of stump, Misbah defends on the front foot
defended on the off side
full length on middle stump, worked off the pads to deep square leg
defended on the front foot towards mid-on
short of a length outside off and Misbah opens the face to drive through cover point
short of a length outside off stump, cut off the back foot to point
Akmal jumps back and taps the ball through midwicket

dropped! Akmal tried to pull one that wasn't short enough, the line was outside off stump as well. The ball lobbed up towards silly mid-off, Mathews moved to his right from short cover and dived. He didn't time his leap well and spilled it. That ball rose too quickly for Akmal to pull properly
played to point from the crease
cut off the back foot to third man
short of a length delivery pulled to deep square leg
a slower ball on middle stump, defended from the crease on the leg side
short of a length and wide outside off stump, the bowler's a bit lucky to get away with that
loud appeal for lbw is turned down after Akmal gets hit on the pad while defending, that was missing leg stump
defended on the off side
played towards cover on the front foot
pushed towards long on for a single
Misbah lunges forward to defend and gets a bit of an inside edge
a bit too straight from Prasanna and Misbah flicks off the back foot through square
fullish one whipped in front of square for one off the pad
too short, too wide, angling away too, Umar tries to reach out and has a go at it, but cannot get to it
hops in the air and plays out a back of a length ball down towards point, safely done
another back of a length ball, this time he shuffles across and works it towards midwicket for an easy single
Misbah tries to earn runs towards midwicket as well, but he tried to half-pull a shortish one and ended up mistiming it totally
bit of width now but he runs it straight to point
drive uppishly, but in the gap between extra cover and point, sweeper cover tidies up
pushes a full one back towards the bowler who parries it towards mid on
pushes a flattish one straight to short extra cover
here he comes, down the track with the charge, and only an inside edge saves him as the ball trickles past the stumps on the leg side
Misbah meanwhile nudges backward of square for one
pushed towards extra cover off the front foot
inside edge saves Umar again, this time he wanted to slog-sweep in front of square leg, but it almost sneaked through but for the inside edge
turned with the spin in front of square leg
gets forward and whips to midwicket
squeezes a very full one back to dilshan
ties him up with a full one on middle and leg, he taps it down the track
they sneak a single as this push rolls past the bowler
shuffles across and turns with a lot of wrist in front of square leg
short of a length and wide outside off stump, played from the crease towards backward point
Misbah moves forward and across to play on the leg side but gets hit on the pad, it was the slower ball
this is quicker, much quicker at 142.5 kph, Misbah tried to steer the good length ball to third man but missed
a bit too full and a bit too straight, Misbah flicks off his pads to deep square leg
short of a length and straight, Akmal jumps back and tucks the ball off his hips through midwicket
short of a length and straight once again, this time Akmal has to defend on the back foot
played from the crease to point
defended on the off side
makes a bit of room and drives to mid off
Misbah makes room again and cuts to backward point
Misbah strides forward and defends this time
Misbah tries to work the ball towards square but doesn't make proper contact, he plays out a maiden over
the slower ball on a good length on off and middle stump, defended on the back foot
full and straight, nearly in the block hole, Akmal defends on the leg side
that's not that short but the line is a bit straight, Akmal moves towards the off side to get inside the line and pulls the ball past the fielder at short fine leg
that is a great shot, Akmal came slightly forward to a full ball and drove it on the up dead straight past the bowler
now he reaches out for a short and wide delivery and tries to cut without really moving his feet, gets beaten
he begins with a slower ball that seams away from around off stump, Misbah lets it go
another slower ball on a straighter line, Misbah plays it off the front foot towards the off side with soft hands, Akmal calls him for the quick single
a third slower ball in the over, Akmal defends on the off side
four in a row, Akmal gets beaten outside off by the slowness of the delivery, the ball bounces a second time before reaching Sangakkara and he doesn't collect cleanly
worked off the pads towards fine leg, that was a bit too straight from Malinga
defended from outside off stump towards cover
that is some shot! Akmal clears his front foot out of the way, picks up a length ball and smashes it over the midwicket boundary with a free and full swing of his bat
slower ball outside off stump, Akmal tries to blast the ball through cover but gets beaten
Akmal jumps back and steers a short of a length delivery to third man

lbw! No question about that one and I suspect Misbah knew it as soon as the ball slammed into his pad in front of middle stump. He moved across his crease to play on the leg side and was beaten by one that angled into him from a good length around off stump
played off the pads behind square
full toss outside off stump, a low one at that, driven through cover
Akmal takes the flat ball from leg stump and clips it through midwicket
Razzaq defends on the front foot
short delivery outside off stump, cut to the fielder at deep point
Akmal jumps down the pitch and makes room by moving towards leg to drive the ball hard towards extra cover, where the fielder takes pace off the ball
driven to long on for a single
slightly shorter in length so Akmal moves back and forces the ball through midwicket
Akmal moves back and across and plays the ball towards the bowler
defended on the front foot on the off side
nudged off the front foot through midwicket
Razzaq stays in his crease and defends back to the bowler
bowled flat on middle stump, Razzaq moves back and plays towards mid-on, Prasanna runs to his right from over the wicket and saves the single
Razzaq shoulders arms outside off stump, the ball keeps a bit low and Sangakkara can't collect cleanly
punched off the back foot on the off side
a full toss which is driven to long-on
the batsman leans forward and clips a full toss through midwicket
driven back to the bowler
makes room and drives to long off
Razzaq moves forward and drives to long off
Akmal moves back and punches to long on

a huge appeal for caught behind is turned down and Tillakaratne Dilshan reviews the decision after a chat with Sangakkara. The ball was tossed up outside off and it turned away from Razzaq, who tried to drive extravagantly through cover. Sangakkara was so confident in his appeal he didn't even attempt to try and stump Razzaq. The replays are not very clear so the on-field decision stays.
a low full toss driven to long off
Prasanna drops his hand towel as he delivers the ball, Akmal clips through midwicket
Razzaq goes right back and plays the ball off his pads through square leg
driven from the crease towards cover
played to long off for a single
played down the ground to long off for one more
played off the back foot towards backward point
Razzaq stays in his crease and drives to long off
Akmal reaches his fifty by clipping the ball through midwicket. He played some rash shots at the start of his innings but has settled down nicely. Pakistan need far more from him though
Akmal reaches out for a tossed up ball outside off and drives through cover
Akmal moves forward and across and nudges on the leg side
left alone outside off stump
played off the back foot to cover
played off the back foot to deep point, Pakistan reach 100
moves back and forces the ball off the pads through midwicket
Akmal gets hit on the front pad as he tries to defend but that was missing leg stump
Akmal gets hit on the pad once again on the front foot, this was more down leg than the previous one

Razzaq's been run out! Akmal hit the ball to wide long-on and the batsmen decided to run a difficult second. Perera's throw from the deep was flat and fast, reaching Mendis on the bounce. The bowler collected and broke the stumps with Razzaq about a foot short
nudged off the pads in front of square and Akmal runs a second once again
flicked through midwicket for a single
played off the front foot towards cover point
nudged off the front pad towards midwicket
Sarfraz defends on the front foot towards point
Sarfraz gets behind the line of a tight delivery on off stump and defends
defended on the off side
tossed up outside off stump, driven to point
another flighted delivery on off stump, driven to the fielder at cover
Akmal plays the reverse sweep but doesn't make proper contact, there's an appeal for lbw but it hit the bat
defended on the front foot on the off side
played off the back foot to long off for a single
Akmal jumps down the pitch and drives to long on
pushed off the front foot towards cover
Akmal moves back and cuts the ball from close to off stump through point
full ball on middle stump, played through midwicket
pushed off the front foot to long off for a single
Akmal moves back and nudges the ball off the pads
cut off the back foot through point
Akmal charges down the track, makes room and almost yorks himself, he ends up playing back to the bowler
driven to long off for a single
tossed up outside off, Umar bounds out to drive to mid-off.
not so full this time, he again comes out, and gets the single into extra-cover.
flat and fast, pushes Sarfraz back in the crease and he defends to the leg side.
slow and tossed up, Sarfraz sweeps for a single.
high-class stroke from Umar, who skips out, gets to the flight and goes inside out with the turn into the extra cover area.
tossed up on the pads, assiduously whipped through square leg for one.
offcutter, back of a length and coming in, defended from the crease.
134 kph, a touch wider of off stump and Sarfraz steers it to point who is standing quite close.
good tight lines, keeps it back of a length outside off and Sarfraz looks to have a flash at it. Misses the edge.
fourth time lucky for the single, he stays beside the line and guides into the covers.
short of a length, 135 kph and forces Umar to push without timing into the covers.
short of a length outside off, but enough width to get him to time it into the covers.
driven off the front foot through cover point
Akmal gets hit on the pad by one that slides on through as he tries to defend, got an inside edge on to the pad
played to long on for a single
defended on the front foot on the off side
Sarfraz sweeps the ball along the ground from outside off stump to deep square leg
driven off the front foot to long on
pushed off the front foot through cover point
driven crisply off the front foot through cover
played back to the bowler on the front foot
chipped in the air but through the gap at midwicket, Fernando chases
good length and straight, pushed off the front foot to mid-on
played off the front foot towards long off
driven off the front foot through cover
tossed up on middle stump, nudged off the pad in front of square
worked off the back foot through square leg
cut off the back foot towards point where Chandimal fumbles
short ball outside off stump, a long hop in fact, and Akmal cuts the ball hard off the back foot through point
nudged off the front foot behind square
the slower ball bowled in the blockhole close to off stump, the batsman tried to play behind point and was beaten
Akmal backs away and pulls along the ground to deep square leg
too full on the pads, a half volley, which Sarfraz clips to the deep backward square leg boundary
Sarfraz steers the short of a length ball to point
another full ball on middle stump, Sarfraz plays towards mid-on but the ball is intercepted by the fielder at midwicket
played of the back foot through cover
Sarfraz opens the face and plays the ball towards backward point, where Dilshan fields

loud appeal for lbw as the batsman walks across and forward to play on the leg side, the ball hit the flap of the pad so may have been a bit high. Sri Lanka have no reviews left. Replays indicate the ball would have clipped the top of the bails, so fair call
the slower ball bowled in the block hole, dug out towards cover
another slower ball outside off stump, Akmal tries to late cut to third man but gets a bottom edge into the ground to the keeper
Akmal is once again beaten outside off by a slower ball
Akmal closes the face too early to play on the leg side but gets a leading edge towards short third man, I suspect that was a slower ball as well
full ball down leg side, wide called
slower ball outside off stump, the batsman defends on the front foot
played from the crease behind point for a single
that's just cleared mid-off! Akmal backs away to make room and slaps a short of a length ball flat towards mid-off, where Mahela leaped backwards in the air but couldn't reach it
full toss outside off stump, Akmal backs away to make room and cracks the ball through point for four more
and again, the best shot of the lot! Akmal makes room and drives a length ball inside out from leg stump through cover

what has he done! After hitting three consecutive boundaries and bringing the asking-rate below six an over, Akmal's thrown it away. He made room once again by moving towards leg and hit a full ball hard and flat but straight to mid-on, where Chandimal took the catch. The ball was hit so hard that Chandimal fell backwards as he caught it and then tumbled over his head

lbw! A low full toss that is dead straight and dipping on the batsman. Sarfraz tries to flick across the line and misses the ball. He's hit flush in front of the stumps. And just like that both set batsmen have been dismissed. On second thought, however, that might have been swinging down leg side. It looked close at normal speed though.
another low full toss that Gul plays to mid-on
Gul plays the ball out of the block hole towards point
short of a length delivery at the body, played behind square
the full ball swinging away from the right-hander, Afridi plays to midwicket from his crease
slap, smash. Afridi thumps a short ball from Malinga through midwicket, the ball absolutely races to the boundary
loud appeal for lbw but there was an inside edge on to the pad as the batsman tried to play on the leg side

this time he's been given! The ball was full and straight once again, Gul tried to play across the line and was hit on the pad plumb in front. Was there another inside edge though? I'll let you know soon. No inside edge. Out.
played off the front foot towards midwicket
Ajmal tries to play towards square leg but misses and is hit on the pad
Perera pitches the ball on a great length outside off stump and cuts it back into the right-hander, going through the gap between bat and pad, very close to off stump
good length around off stump, defended on the front foot, what a time to bowl a wicket maiden
full length and straight, at a slightly slower pace, played back to the bowler
loud appeal for lbw as a full toss dips on the batsman and clips the thigh pad, that was not swinging enough to not miss leg stump
played from the crease on the leg side
another full delivery hits the pad but the impact was outside leg stump

Afridi's slogged the ball high in the air, it's gone miles in the air, and when it comes down it's falling somewhere between square leg and midwicket. Fernando is the fielder attempting the catch but he doesn't judge it well and can't get into a good position to take the catch. Barely gets a hand on it but that's a drop.
played to deep cover for a single
driven to wide long off and there's an appeal for a run out after Ajmal returns for the second run, Mendis was the fielder in the deep, the batsman was just home as Perera broke the stumps
a low full toss pulled to deep midwicket
full ball on off and middle stump, played to mid-on
another one in the blockhole, defended on the leg side
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Ajmal gets squared up on the back foot and is beaten
played with an open face towards third man and Ajmal takes on the fielder and hares back for the second, the throw is poor
Afridi charges immediately and drives the ball hard to long off

there's an appeal for run out and is Afridi in danger here? Ajmal paddled the ball to short fine leg and Afridi set off for a risky single. Ajmal didn't run and then Afridi had to turn around and sprint back to the non-striker's end. Mahela threw the ball back to the bowler, who broke the stumps. It's a very close call despite Afridi's long stride and fully stretched and grounded bat. After several replays, the TV umpire decides Afridi will get the benefit of the doubt
played off the pads behind square for a single
Afridi steps out and makes room to smash the ball on the full straight back at the bowler along the ground, the ball speeds between Prasanna's legs and long-off can't save the boundary either
this has sailed over extra cover! Afridi jumps out of his crease, moves towards leg and launches the ball inside out for six
played off the pads through square leg
short ball and Afridi punishes Fernando with a fearsome pull through midwicket, he lofted it over the in field and into the gap in the deep
the slower ball on the pads, Afridi plays the ball through square leg for a single

There's only one left now! Afridi's a goner. Ajmal played the ball close on the off side and Afridi began to thunder down the pitch for the single to get on strike. Dilshan was the fielder sprinting in from backward point, swooping on the ball with one hand, picking up cleanly and, in one fluid motion, throwing the ball under-arm to score a direct hit at the striker's end. Afridi was half a foot short and Dilshan is pumped
played on the front foot towards point
played to Dilshan at backward point
driven of the front foot to cover
Ajmal slogs the ball along the ground to long on
played back to the bowler
Cheema slogs across the line and gets an inside edge on to the boot
hit off the back foot towards long on
hit to long off with a flat bat
Cheema tries to sweep from outside of stump but gets beaten
nearly in the block hole on middle and leg, played from the crease to midwicket
Ajmal makes room by moving towards leg but gets beaten by a full ball outside off
played to long on for a single
a full toss on the pads and Cheema flicks the ball to the long leg boundary, Prasanna dives to his left but can't prevent the four
played from the crease to backward point, it was the slower ball
defended on the off side
Ajmal charges and slogs, mis-hitting the ball towards square leg
full toss, which Cheema swats towards deep midwicket

it's all over! Ajmal backs away and slogs the ball in the air towards long-on, the batsmen run a single, but then decide to chance an overthrow after the ball passes the stumps at the bowler's end. Sangakkara is quick to anticipate this though, and is in position to collect the ball. He hits the stumps direct at the non-striker's end, running out Cheema
